divs: sighting detailsapprox 2 months ago i witnessed 2 military helicopters chasing a ball of fire at about 1500 ft above my house approx 11 pm,the ball was leaving a contrail of somesort and no noise only choppers noise.and last week i spotted the orange ball at a altitude of 10-15 thousand feet(being a pilot i know what color anti collision lights are supposed to be from one direction to another) so i was wondering why no red or green,white strobes were blinking.as i watched it for a few moments tear drop like flames would drip from the bottom 3 xs in a row 3-4 times, i called my friend\roomate out to the deck and he caught the last 3 drips before it disapeared completely for 10 seconds then appeared for another 5 seconds and went very dull colored orange before diapearing while traveling west to east approx 500-700 mph.well last night the orange ball appeared agian doing the same show traveling west to east again at approx 7-10 thousand feet, i yelled to my friend again and he came flying out the door and was able to catch it dripping orange as it turned and started coming towards my place when it orbed off and on maybe 2-4 times before it went above the clouds and lost it.i live on a hill in a rural area that looks towards corona and thats where it seems to start or atleast where i always first see it.i hope for another show, camera is ready this time.will let you know.
